A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Deconstructionist drivel shrouded in extraordinary special effects.  With all the money spent on this film\, why didn't anyone bother to pay for a REAL screenplay?  As bad of a story as the acting was in the prequels.  Abrams is a cheap shot hack.  This was so bad I will not go to the final movie.  I AM SO DISAPPOINTED!!!!!
